backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing memories, songs, and YouTube links with CRUD operations, submitter-based permissions, and timestamping.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as the entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application controlling password gate, welcome flow, memory filtering by role, and overall UI layout including media widgets.
frontend/src/components/MemoryEditDialog: Dialog for editing existing memories with validation, file handling, previews, and permission checks before submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/MemoryFullscreen: Displays a full-screen modal for viewing a memory with permission checks, media rendering, and optional editing.
frontend/src/components/MemoryList.tsx: Renders a list of memory cards with metadata, media previews, fullscreen view, and edit controls.
frontend/src/components/MemorySubmitForm: Form for submitting new memories with validation, image/video upload support, and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/MusicBoxWidget.t: Widget for uploading, listing, and playing audio files with validation and audio playback management.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: A login gate that verifies username and 4‑digit access code before unlocking protected content.
frontend/src/components/VideoViewer.tsx: Modal video viewer that plays a memory’s video and handles playback errors gracefully.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePage.tsx: A React welcome screen showing themed imagery and text with buttons to continue or lock the app.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeLinksDial: A dialog for submitting and viewing YouTube links with validation, error handling, and a list of saved links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and logic using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: Fetches, submits, and edits memory entries via the backend actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Implements a simple username/password gate using sessionStorage and exposes unlock/lock state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that previous Tingi search code was removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongs.ts: Fetches and uploads songs through the backend actor and keeps the song list updated via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWelcomeGate.ts: Tracks whether the welcome screen was dismissed using sessionStorage and exposes reset/dismiss actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeLinks.ts: Fetches and submits YouTube links via the backend actor, sorting by timestamp and refreshing on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom light/dark color palette for the app’s theme.
frontend/src/lib/audio.ts: Provides utilities to convert files to Uint8Array and back to data URLs with MIME type guessing.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable date-time strings.
frontend/src/lib/googleCustomSearch.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/pidduDeterministic.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/tingiHumor.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, access rules, and architectural notes.
